alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 2:43AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LAURENS AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENVILLE COUNTIES THROUGH 315 AM EDT... At 243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Laurens, or 5 miles north of Ware Shoals, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Laurens, Gray Court, Princeton, and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
